item.title: How to send GET and POST Ajax API requests in Vanilla JavaScript
item.author: Vipin.Madhaan@gmail.com (Vipin Kumar Madhaan)
item.description: Ajax is an asynchronous JavaScript and XML mechanism for updating a portion of a page. It allows you to update a portion of the page after receiving data from the server, avoiding the need to refresh the entire page. Furthermore, by integrating partial page refreshes in this manner, we not only provide an excellent user experience but also reduce the server burden.
